text:
DR Kang and the staff in this clinic are very warm and pleasant . The clinic environment is clean and welcoming . As we make appointments before coming in , there is usually a very short wait to see the doctor .

Dr Kang is patient and assuring , answering all my questions . His medications work well on me. He is knowledgeable and very approachable .

The clinic also checks in with me a few days after a consultation , just to check how everything is going . ðŸ˜Š

The dentist is very kind and patient with kids. My girls were made extremely comfortable during the treatment. Also the front office staff are great at their job. Calm vibe and fairly easy to get an appointment.

I feel very fortunate to have found the clinic in my new neighbourhood. It was very easy to make an appointment. The staff and the doctors are impeccably polite and helpful. I have just had my first dental checkup. I am usually quite nervous about those, but it went very well. Even the much dreaded scaling and polish felt much gentler than usual. Iâ€™ll happily bring the entire family.

Very satisfied with the service of the team at the clinic. Doctors and nurses are very caring and have a pleasant demeanor. Clinic will follow up after a few days to check on the patients. Communication and booking of appts are also very efficient via WhatsApp.
Been seeing Dr Eloise since her days in Kallang Leisure Mall. Always a pleasure to visit as a patient. She is kind and caring, constantly asking if Iâ€™m okay during treatment.  Very good dentist.
